title: USA TODAY Bestsellers
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION USA TODAY Bestsellers 
1. "The Murder House" by James Patterson and David Ellis (Little, Brown) 
2. "Killing Reagan" by Bill O'Reilly (Henry Holt and Co.) 
3. "The Martian" by Andy Weir (Crown) 
4. "After You" by Jojo Moyes (Pamela Dorman Books) 
5. "The Girl in the Spider's Web" by David Lagercrantz (Knopf) 
6. "Make Me" by Lee Child (Delacorte) 
7. "The Cinder Spires: The Aeronaut's Windlass" by Jim Butcher (Roc) 
8. "Willow Brook Road" by Sherryl Woods (Harlequin, MIRA) 
9. "Pretty Girls" by Karin Slaughter (William Morrow) 
10. "The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up" by Marie Kondo (Ten Speed) 
11. "About a Vampire" by Lynsay Sands (Avon) 
12. "Down the Rabbit Hole" by J.D. Robb, Mary Blaney, Elaine Fox, Mary Kay McComas and R.C. Ryan (Jove) 
13. "Shadow Play" by Iris Johansen (St. Martin's Press) 
14. "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins (Riverhead) 
15. "Library of Souls" by Ransom Riggs (Quirk Books) 
16. "Gray Mountain" by John Grisham (Dell) 
17. "The Hidden" by Heather Graham (Harlequin, MIRA) 
18. "Why Not Me?" by Mindy Kaling (Crown Archetype) 
19. "Double Down: The Men Of The Sisterhood ?1" by Fern Michaels (Zebra) 
20. "Marry Me at Christmas" by Susan Mallery (Harlequin, HQN) 
21. "Come Rain or Come Shine" by Jan Karon (G.P. Putnam's Sons) 
22. "The 20/20 Diet" by Phil McGraw (Bird Street Books) 
23. "All the Light We Cannot See" by Anthony Doerr (Scribner) 
24. "Big Magic" by Elizabeth Gilbert (Riverhead) 
25. "Evergreen Springs" by RaeAnne Thayne (Harlequin HQN) 
Reporting stores include: Amazon.com, Amazon Kindle, Barnes & Noble.com, Barnes & Noble Inc., Barnes & Noble e-books, BooksAMillion.com, Books-A-Million, Bookland and Books & Co., Costco, Davis-Kidd Booksellers (Nashville, Memphis), Hudson Booksellers, Joseph-Beth Booksellers (Lexington, Ky.; Cincinnati, Charlotte, Cleveland, Pittsburgh), Kobo, Inc., Powell's Books (Portland, Ore.), Powells.com, R.J. Julia Booksellers (Madison, Conn.), Schuler Books & Music (Grand Rapids, Okemos, Eastwood, Alpine, Mich.), Sony Reader Store, Target, Tattered Cover Book Store (Denver).
